item.title: Install Older and Newer PHP version on AWS EC2
item.description: To install older or newer version of PHP with AWS utility amazon-linux-extras enable php7.1 amazon-linux-extras install php7.1 Install PHP extension yum update yum install php-cli php-pdo php-fpm php-json php-mysqlnd
